articles.title: KPA Panmunjom Mission on Gravity of Military Provocations in MDL Area
articles.content:
KPA Panmunjom Mission on Gravity of Military Provocations in MDL Area
Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- The Panmunjom mission of the Korean People's Army (KPA) on Tuesday released an open letter disclosing the gravity of military provocations and confrontation acts being made by the warmongers in the area along the Military Demarcation Line (MDL) to ignite the second Korean war.
					 The demilitarized zone of the MDL has turned into the biggest hotspot where a fuse of a total war may be ignited any moment, the letter noted, saying:
					
					 Such military provocations as the "invasion of Mt. Songak", a prelude to the June 25 war in the 1950s, are escalating and acts of stoking confrontation and conflicts that may spill over into a total war in a moment are being perpetrated in an unbroken chain every day.
					
					 The heinous moves of the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet forces to reduce the demilitarized zone into an outpost for invading the north and a theatre of confrontation with the compatriots in the north are baffling human imagination.
					
					 The puppet forces have already modified their combat rules and regulations in the zone to facilitate their military provocation.
					
					 The gravity of the situation is that the desperate and undisguised military provocations are all being committed in the whole area along the MDL under the direct control and command of the south Korean puppet Defense Ministry and Chongwadae.
					
					 It is no exaggeration to say that the prevailing situation in the zone has reached a brink of war against the DPRK.
					
					 Psychological warfare being staged in the whole area along the MDL has reached an extreme pitch.
					
					 The puppet forces are staging their anti-socialist, anti-DPRK "loudspeaker propaganda" for more than 16 hours a day.
					
					 According to data opened to the public alone, tens of millions of leaflets peppered with rubbish malignantly slandering the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK and its social system and people's living were scattered in recent few months.
					
					 The south Korean war maniacs are using the demilitarized zone of the MDL and its vicinity as an anti-communist propaganda theatre to incite confrontation with the compatriots in the north by mobilizing not only ordinary citizens but also youngsters of south Korea.
					
					 Revealing the wicked design sought by the south Korean puppet regime in escalating military tensions in the area along the MDL, the letter went on:
					
					 In fact, such dangerous military provocations and confrontation moves in the demilitarized zone of the MDL were launched as soon as the war in the 1950s ceased.
					
					 Far from drawing a lesson from their bitter defeat in the three-year war of aggression, the south Korean puppet forces have been hell-bent on the adventurous military provocations, regarding the MDL demilitarized zone as an advanced post for their "single-handed north expedition".
					
					 Their escalated military provocations in the zone would cause a grave phase that might lead to a war on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 Such actions throwing the whole area along the MDL into a crisis of confrontation and conflict are ascribable to the U.S. rude hostile policy toward the DPRK.
					
					 As its scheme to turn the Korean Armistice Agreement (AA) provisions on the MDL demilitarized zone in its favor led to naught, the U.S. started to systematically scrap the already concluded AA.
					
					 It is a trite method of the U.S. to under the mask of the defunct Military Armistice Commission of the "UN Command," zealously patronize the frantic anti-DPRK war games frequently staged by the puppet warmongers in the frontline areas in land and sea as "just drills" complying with the "legal procedure" conformed to the AA.
					
					 It was just the U.S. which staged an weird act of sending a "message" through loudspeaker in Panmunjom to explain about the justness of puppet military warmongers' provocative "operation for removing" illegal fishing boats at the mouth of Han River and engaged itself in it.
					
					 The MDL is a symbol of grudge and tragedy that should be removed by dint of arms of Songun at an early date, the letter said, adding: 
					
					 It is the invariable will of the DPRK army and people to remove the MDL, little different from a time bomb against the north, as early as possible and ensure durable peace and security on the Korean peninsula and achieve the great cause of national reunification.
					
					 In this planet there are not a few places where bloodbath, turbulence, dispute and close combat are witnessed, but no such place can be seen as the demilitarized zone of the MDL where the danger of a nuclear war persists all the time.
					
					 Any member of the nation with patriotism should resolutely smash the reckless moves of the warmongers getting frantic to reduce the MDL into an ignition point for the second Korean war.
					
					 The letter warned that the war hysteria of the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet group seeking to unleash the second war against the DPRK, oblivious of their bitter defeat from the past Korean War, would certainly meet a due punishment.

articles.title: Cambodian King, Great Queen Send Large Floral Baskets to DPRK Embassy
articles.content:
Cambodian King, Great Queen Send Large Floral Baskets to DPRK Embassy
Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- Cambodian King Norodom Sihamoni and Great Queen Norodom Monineath Sihanouk sent large floral baskets to the DPRK Embassy in Phnom Penh on July 1 on the 22nd anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The floral baskets were laid before the portraits of smiling Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Un from Ethiopian Youth Organization
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Un from Ethiopian Youth Organization
Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, received a gift from the Addis Ababa Youth Association of Ethiopia.
					 The gift was handed to an official concerned on July 3 by President of the association Gelta Ermiyas Mathewos, head of a delegation of the association, on a visit to the DPRK.

articles.title: Floral Baskets, Congratulatory Letters to Kim Jong Un
articles.content:
Floral Baskets, Congratulatory Letters to Kim Jong Un
Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a floral basket and a congratulatory letter from the military attaches corps here on his election as chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK.
					 The floral basket and congratulatory letter were conveyed to Army General Pak Yong Sik, minister of the People's Armed Forces, by Military, Naval and Air Attache of the Chinese Embassy here Zhang Ping who is doyen of the military attaches corps on Tuesday.
					
					 Kim Jong Un received floral baskets and congratulatory letters from the missions of UNDP, WFP, WHO, UNICEF, FAO and UNPF here.

articles.title: Floral Baskets to Kim Jong Un from Foreign Personages
articles.content:
Floral Baskets to Kim Jong Un from Foreign Personages
Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received floral baskets from foreign personages on Tuesday in congratulations of his election as chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK.
					 They were Johnny Hon, co-chairman of the Board of Directors of the Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il Foundation, Ibrahim Mantu, chairman of the Nigeria-Korea Friendship Association, the secretary general of the China Hong Kong Zhonghwa Energy Fund Commission, the general manager of the Golden Trip Travel Service Co. Ltd., Hong Kong, China and the chairperson of the Emperor Group of Hong Kong, China.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Remembered by Foreign Crewmen
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Remembered by Foreign Crewmen
Haeju, July 5 (KCNA) -- There took place a meeting of foreign crewmen to remember President Kim Il Sung at Haeju Port on Tuesday with the approach of the 22nd anniversary of his demise.
					 The participants laid bouquets before the statues of Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in Haeju City and paid tribute to them.
					
					 Present at the meeting were the captain and crewmen of Cambodia-flagged ship EVER BRIGHT.
					
					 Speakers said that Kim Il Sung, the most outstanding elder statesman in the 20th century recognized by the world, enjoyed the absolute trust of all people as he performed extraordinary exploits in the Korean revolution, the cause of global independence and the development of friendly relations among countries and would always live in the hearts of all of us.
					
					 They went on:
					
					 The President liberated the country from the colonial rule by the Japanese imperialists, built new Korea in which the people became masters, beat back the imperialist allied forces in the last Fatherland Liberation War against the U.S. imperialists' invasion and saved the destiny of the country and the nation.
					
					 That is why the Korean people miss him very much, highly praising him as a liberator of the country, founder of socialist Korea and father of nation-building.
					
					 A letter to Marshal Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting.

articles.title: Central Bank Delegation Back Home
articles.content:
Central Bank Delegation Back Home
Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Central Bank led by President Kim Chon Gyun came back home Tuesday after taking part in the 25th International Bank Congress held in Sankt-Peterburg of Russia.

articles.title: Workers and Members of GFTUK Meet
articles.content:
Workers and Members of GFTUK Meet
Kangso, July 5 (KCNA) -- A meeting of workers and members of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea (GFTUK) took place at the Kumsong Tractor Factory Tuesday on the 22nd anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Present at the meeting were Choe Ryong Hae, vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, officials concerned, officials and members of the GFTUK and other workers.
					
					 Ju Yong Gil, chairman of the Central Committee of the GFTUK, made a report to be followed by speeches.
					
					 The reporter and speakers said that the President built Korean-style socialism centered on the popular masses on this land by wisely leading two revolutionary wars, two stages of social revolution and socialist construction.
					
					 The President successfully settled the issue of succession to the revolutionary cause, providing a decisive guarantee for the final completion of the cause of the Juche revolution and eternal prosperity of the country, they noted, and went on:
					
					 After the liberation of the country he formed the trade union based on tradition of the building of mass political organization of the working class provided during the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle and clearly indicated the way to be followed by the trade union in every period and at each stage of the developing revolution.
					
					 His revolutionary idea and cause were successfully inherited by leader Kim Jong Il and are given a steady continuity thanks to the lofty loyalty of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The reporter and speakers called for demonstrating the revolutionary spirit of heroic Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il working class in the struggle to bring earlier the building of a socialist power and the final victory of the cause of the Juche revolution under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: More Meetings Held in Provinces, Cities, Counties
articles.content:
More Meetings Held in Provinces, Cities, Counties
Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- Meetings of service personnel and people in North Hwanghae, North Hamgyong and Ryanggang Provinces, Nampho City and other cities and counties took place to congratulate Marshal Kim Jong Un on his election as chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK.
					 Attending there were officials of the local party and power organs, working people's organizations, industrial establishments, farms and universities, service personnel of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, people from all walks of life and youths and students.
					
					 Reports were delivered to be followed by congratulatory speeches.
					
					 The reporters and speakers said that Kim Jong Un's election to the top post of the DPRK amid the absolute support and trust of all service personnel and people was a great revolutionary event of historic significance in accomplishing the cause of the Juche revolution pioneered in Mt. Paektu.
					
					 They called on the officials, party members and other working people to make active contributions to adding shine to the Kim Jong Un's glorious era with the proud victory in the drive for building a socialist power by attaining the goals of the five-year strategy for national economic development set forth by the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 Representatives of service personnel declared they would keep themselves highly alerted and closely follow the aggression moves of the U.S. imperialists and their followers and firmly guarantee the cause of building a socialist power with the arms of revolution.
					
					 Representatives of youths and students said they would steadily create new legendary tales about heroic youth by fully displaying the spirit of self-reliance and self-development and the charging spirit of young people in the worksites for building a socialist power.

articles.title: Great Devotion for Solving People's Clothing Problem
articles.content:
Great Devotion for Solving People's Clothing Problem
Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- People in the DPRK are recalling with deep emotion the devoted efforts paid by President Kim Il Sung for solving the people's clothing problem, with the approach of his death anniversary (July 8).
					 After the country's liberation from the Japanese colonial rule, Kim Il Sung had paid deep attention to the people's clothing problem. In the wake of the Fatherland Liberation War (1950-1953), he set it as an important state affair.
					
					 Under his leadership, textile mills were built in different parts of the country in a short span of time.
					
					 The DPRK people still remember the story about his inspection of islands in the West Sea of Korea.
					
					 Despite of inclement sea weather and rainstorm, he walked round the muddy islands to solve the problem of reed.
					
					 He personally planted reed in his garden and observed its biological features for over 20 years.
					
					 When the production of fiber with reed was put on an industrial basis, he was very pleased to feel relieved from the problem of people's clothing.
					
					 Thanks to his great loving care for the people, the Juche-based vinalon industry was developed in the DPRK.
					
					 Indeed, Kim Il Sung was the fatherly leader of all people of the DPRK.

articles.title: Scientific Achievements Made
articles.content:
Scientific Achievements Made
Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- Scientists of the DPRK State Academy of Sciences have recently made scientific achievements conducive to the development of the national economy.
					 They opened up a vista for the home production of 10-odd kinds of functional paper. And they completed a construction method for Korean-style colour concrete floor and realized the local production of finishing paints.
					
					 The achievements also include the introduction of IT-based stock-raising system and concentrated monitoring system to the livestock bases in Sepho area.
					
					 Meanwhile, scientists and technicians active at the Chemical Building Complex manufactured a 100-ton air coal sorter and an advanced dust collector in a little more than 15 days.

articles.title: Heavy Rain Witnessed in DPRK
articles.content:
Heavy Rain Witnessed in DPRK
Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- Heavy rainfall was witnessed in North and South Hwanghae and Kangwon provinces and other parts of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea from 12:00 Monday to 9:00 Tuesday.
					 It rained 170 mm, 139 mm, 132 mm, 158 mm and 154 mm in Hoeyang, Phyonggang, Kosong, Changdo and Kimhwa counties of Kangwon Province, 138 mm and 137 mm in Paechon and Pongchon counties of South Hwanghae Province, 175 mm and 135 mm in Jangphung and Kumchon counties of North Hwanghae Province and 140 mm in Kaesong City.
					
					 On July 1, the rainfalls in Ichon, Phyonggang and Sepho counties of Kangwon Province were 142 mm, 121 mm and 115 mm and in Singye and Thosan counties of North Hwanghae Province 128 mm and 114 mm.
					
					 According to Sim Myong Ok, deputy director of the National Meteorological Forecast Squad, it rained heavily in the northern and central parts of the country from late in June to early in July, due to the low pressure frequenting those areas.
					
					 There would be scattered showers in different areas for several days by the seasonal rainy front staying in the southern part of the country, she said, adding the rainy season may begin after July 10.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams Japanese Reactionaries for Imbuing Youngsters with Ambition to Grab Tok Islets
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams Japanese Reactionaries for Imbuing Youngsters with Ambition to Grab Tok Islets
Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- It was disclosed once again that the Japanese reactionaries recently saw to it that the false story about "dominium over Tok Islets" was included in the exam for primary schoolchildren.
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun on Tuesday says: 
					
					 This is a cynical ploy to make the schoolchildren believe that the Korean nation is an occupier of Tok Islets and they are part of Japan's territory occupied by Koreans.
					
					 The danger of such brazen-faced distortion of history is that it is a prelude to the war to be ignited by the descendants of samurais as they are keen to instill the ambition for territorial expansion and revanchism into the young Japanese and thus drive them to the reinvasion of Korea.
					
					 What merits a serious attention is that the moves of Japan to seize the islets are going beyond the distortion of history.
					
					 The descendants of samurais are putting their scenarios for grabbing the islets by force of arms into practice one by one.
					
					 The U.S. zealous backing helped the Japanese reactionaries get rid of fetters of being a war criminal state and provided them with conditions for staging a comeback to Korea and openly launching a war of aggression for world domination.
					
					 The DPRK is its primary target.
					
					 The above-said propaganda is aimed at inventing a pretext for reinvasion.
					
					 This is, however, nothing but a daydream.
					
					 If Japan persists in its moves to grab the islets, the army and people of the DPRK who show neither mercy nor pardon will send Japan to the bottom of the East Sea of Korea through their merciless strikes.

articles.title: Minju Joson Blasts Reckless Remarks of South Korean Puppet Minister of Unification
articles.content:
Minju Joson Blasts Reckless Remarks of South Korean Puppet Minister of Unification
Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- Hong Yong Phyo, puppet minister of Unification of south Korea, talked rubbish inciting confrontation with the compatriots again at a recent plenary meeting of the Committee for Diplomacy and Unification of the "National Assembly". He said that "there is no south-north dialogue unless the north opts for denuclearization," "dialogue would give only time and justification to the north" and "it is necessary to force the north to change through sanctions first."
					 Minju Joson Tuesday observes in a commentary in this regard:  
					
					 What Hong uttered is no more than desperate efforts of the confrontation maniacs to get rid of the mire of bankruptcy as it is a revelation of hysteric fit of a half wit unaware of public mindset and the trend of the times and a psychopath seized with confrontation with the compatriots in the north.
					
					 The puppet Ministry of Unification has done nothing good for the inter-Korean relations and national reunification. If there be any, it has only taken the lead in inciting the confrontation with the compatriots and deteriorating the inter-Korean relations.
					
					 He has only played the role of a marionette and political servant of Chongwadae, vociferating about "the north's denuclearization," "sanctions" and "change of north," reading the face of the chief executive and pleasing her.
					
					 All facts go to patently prove that the mandarins of the ministry are only pursuing "unification of social systems", "unification through absorption" and sticking to confrontation with the DPRK to the last by justifying its campaign for "the north's denuclearization" and "sanctions" under the absurd pretexts.
					
					 They will not be able to escape the stern punishment by history and nation for recklessly swimming against the trend of the times.

articles.title: Minju Joson Ridicules Japan's Bid to Be Leader of Asia
articles.content:
Minju Joson Ridicules Japan's Bid to Be Leader of Asia
Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- Actions against U.S. forces' presence in Japan are rapidly mounting in Japan, says Minju Joson Tuesday in a commentary.
					 It goes on:
					
					Days ago, there took place a rally opposing U.S. forces in Naha City, Okinawa Prefecture, Japan with 65,000 people attending. Meanwhile, public circles of Japan are growing vocal demanding the revision of the SOFA granting extraterritorial privileges to U.S. forces in Japan.
					
					 Anti-Americanism prevailing in Japan is a revelation of the common mentality of the Japanese people to live, their chests thrown out, with independent rights and dignity.
					
					 Japan pretends to be an independent state with sovereignty. However, a mere child knows that Japan is, in fact, a colony of the U.S. and a servant implementing the U.S. policy of aggression.
					
					 The Japanese authorities seek a cunning motive in currying favor with their master U.S. without an iota of self-respect in defiance of the public mindset. 
					
					 The ulterior goal of the Japanese reactionaries is to realize the long-cherished militarist ambition for overseas expansion at any cost, pursuant to the U.S. strategy for dominating Asia.
					
					 They try to gain the position of leader of Asia at any cost by launching a war for overseas aggression backed by the U.S. after leaving the whole of Japan to the U.S. as an advanced base for implementing its policy of continental aggression. 
					
					 Gone are the days never to return when the U.S. could unilaterally pose a military threat to the DPRK as the latter emerged a fresh nuclear power in the East. The security of the U.S. mainland is now exposed to threat.
					
					 It is a daydream for the cunning Japanese reactionaries to get the lion's share by fighting a war, depending on such master.

articles.title: S. Korea-U.S.-Japan Military Drill under Fire
articles.content:
S. Korea-U.S.-Japan Military Drill under Fire
Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- 14 civic and social organizations of south Korea including the People for Achieving Peace and Reunification, the Confederation of Trade Unions, the Solidarity for Progress and the Association for Supporting Prisoners of Conscience of the Family Movement for Realizing Democracy held a press conference on June 28 in denunciation of the joint military exercise of south Korea, the U.S. and Japan.
					 The organizations in a press release slammed south Korea, the U.S. and Japan for staging a missile warning drill in the waters off Hawaii that day.
					
					 The press release said that the drill, from A to Z, is aimed at defending the U.S. and Japan by sacrificing south Korea and at harassing peace by escalating arms race on the Korean peninsula and in Northeast Asia.
					
					 It is clear through the remarks of those concerned with defense in the U.S. that the U.S. is accelerating the building of a triangular missile defense system, the press release noted.
					
					 It demanded the authorities stop south Korea's involvement in the U.S. MD system and cease its military exercises with the U.S. as the first step to do so.

articles.title: S. Korea Damaged by Downpour
articles.content:
S. Korea Damaged by Downpour
Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- Different places of south Korea were damaged by downpour and rainstorm on July 1, according to the south Korean KBS.
					 Damages were serious in Pusan, Ryongin, and Yangju of Kyonggi Province, Seoul and Namwon of North Jolla Province.

articles.title: U.S. and Japan Stage Joint Drill for Nuclear Attack on DPRK
articles.content:
U.S. and Japan Stage Joint Drill for Nuclear Attack on DPRK
Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- The U.S. staged a joint drill for nuclear attack on the DPRK by mobilizing the Japan "Self-Defense Forces" in mid-June, according to KBS of south Korea.
					 Two B-52 strategic bombers from the U.S. Air Force Anderson Base on Guam staged a drill for troops deployment in a strategic region and nuclear strike under the simulated conditions of a contingency with aircraft of the Japan "Self-Defense Forces" and the U.S. marines in Japan, pursuant to the nuclear war scenario of the White House against the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. and south Korean puppet military authorities openly made pubic that the strategic region meant the Korean peninsula.
					
					 As already disclosed, "operation for precision air-raids" upon the nuclear facilities and force of the DPRK is openly being prepared in the U.S.
					
					 The U.S. introduced its nuclear-powered carriers and submarine Mississippi and other nuclear strike means into the waters around the Korean peninsula and its vicinity, according to the "operation".

articles.title: Overseas Koreans Organizations Support Proposal for Holding Great National Conference for Reunification
articles.content:
Overseas Koreans Organizations Support Proposal for Holding Great National Conference for Reunification
Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- The European Regional Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification and the Society for Cooperation among Koreans in Germany issued a solidarity appeal on July 1 in support of the proposal made at the joint conference of the DPRK government, political parties and organizations to hold a great national conference for reunification on the occasion of the 71st anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					 The appeal said that independent and peaceful reunification of the country is the greatest desire of the nation.
					
					 The appeal said that as regards the holding of a great national conference for reunification on the occasion of the 71st anniversary of Korea's liberation the north side preparatory committee sent an open letter to the authorities, political parties, organizations and individuals of south Korea and abroad.
					
					 The appeal warmly supported and hailed the DPRK's proposal in the spirit of national independence, the great national unity and called upon south Korean to express positive solidarity with it.
					
					 It called for successfully holding a great national conference for reunification in August from the patriotic stand to make the nation divided by outside forces one.

articles.title: Brief Biography of Kim Il Sung Introduced by Bulgarian Body
articles.content:
Brief Biography of Kim Il Sung Introduced by Bulgarian Body
Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- The brief biography of President Kim Il Sung was carried by the Bulgaria-Korea Friendship Association on the July issue of its bulletin on the 22nd anniversary of his demise.

articles.title: Works of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Un Introduced by Slovenian Organization
articles.content:
Works of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Un Introduced by Slovenian Organization
Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung's work "Let Us Uphold Independence" and Marshal Kim Jong Un's work "The Cause of the Great Party of Comrades Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il Is Ever-Victorious" were posted by the Slovenian committee for remembering President Kim Il Sung on its website on June 30 on the 22nd anniversary of demise of the President.
					 The President's work, made public on September 7, Juche 70 (1981), clarifies that it is the requirement of the present era to maintain independence in the activities of the party and the state and that the Juche idea is a man-centered philosophy.
					
					 Kim Jong Un's work, published on October 4, Juche 104 (2015), clarifies that the seven decade-long history of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) is the one of victory which demonstrated the validity and invincibility of the cause of the party of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il. It also indicates the tasks and ways for developing the WPK into the party of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il forever.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Remembered in Different Countries
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Remembered in Different Countries
Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- Events took place in different countries from June 27 to 29 on the 22nd anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung. They included round-table talks, book and photo exhibition and film show at the Iran-Korea Friendship Magsal Agro-Stock Farm, a seminar on his exploits and film show by the Group of Youth for the Study of Kim Jong Il Juche idea in Vienna and a lecture by the Youth Group for the Study of the Juche Idea in DR Congo.
					 Displayed at the venue of the book and photo exhibition were works of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un, books on their greatness and books and photos introducing the service personnel and people of the DPRK in their drive for opening the greatest heyday in building a socialist power.
					
					 "Grand Celebration of 70th Founding Anniversary of Workers' Party of Korea in Presence of Respected Comrade Kim Jong Un" and other Korean films were shown.
					
					 The chief of the Group of Youth for the Study of Kim Jong Il Juche Idea in Vienna said:
					
					 President Kim Il Sung, who was born into a revolutionary and patriotic family, started an armed struggle with two pistols bequeathed by his father and put an end to the colonial rule by the Japanese imperialists and achieved the historic cause of national liberation.
					
					 He led to victory the Fatherland Liberation War against the aggression by the U.S. imperialists and their followers, making it possible for the Korean people to honorably defend the freedom and independence of the country.
					
					 The chairman of the Youth Group for the Study of the Juche Idea in DR Congo noted that Kim Il Sung is always alive in the hearts of progressives for the immortal exploits he performed for the Korean revolution and the cause of global independence.
					
					 A message to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the event held in DR Congo.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Russia
Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- A committee for remembering President Kim Il Sung was formed by the Party for Peace and Unity of Russia on June 29.
					 Sazhi Umalatova, chairwoman of the party, was elected chairwoman of the committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize political and cultural events praising Kim Il Sung's revolutionary career and exploits on the 22nd anniversary of his demise.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Russia
Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- A Partizansk City committee for remembering President Kim Il Sung was formed in Russia on July 1.
					 Khmelyov, chairman of the City Assembly and second secretary of the Partizansk City Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation, was elected chairman of the remembrance committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize political and cultural events praising great exploits Kim Il Sung performed for the Korean revolution and the cause of global independence on the 22nd anniversary of his demise.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Malaysia
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Malaysia
Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- A Malaysian committee for remembering President Kim Il Sung was formed in Kuala Lumpur on June 29.
					 The committee set the remembrance period from July 1 to 10 and decided to organize a lecture, photo exhibition, film show and other political and cultural events.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in South Africa
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in South Africa
Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- A South African committee for remembering President Kim Il Sung was formed on June 30.
					 Bonakele Majuba, secretary of the Mfumalanga Provincial Committee of South African Communist Party and chairman of the South African Association of Friendship and Solidarity with Korean People, was elected chairman of the remembrance committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize a seminar, lecture, photo exhibition and other political and cultural events praising the revolutionary career and feats of Kim Il Sung on the 22nd anniversary of his demise.

articles.title: German Body Condemns U.S. Anti-DPRK Moves
articles.content:
German Body Condemns U.S. Anti-DPRK Moves
Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- The Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany made public a statement on June 27 to denounce the U.S. moves against the DPRK and support its just cause.
					 The statement said:
					
					 Signs of last moments of a psychopath have already been seen in the U.S.
					
					 The U.S. and its followers style themselves "Interpol" and cry out for observing international law while provoking wars in different parts of the world. This betrays their silly sense of the reality.
					
					 It is nothing surprising that the U.S. abuses the UN to justify its deeds.
					
					 It is none other than the U.S. that threatens the global peace with ceaseless plot-breeding.
					
					 In the U.S. and the West the wealth created by the popular masses is taken up by a tiny handful of ruling quarters and it is impossible for the people to have access to it.
					
					 In the DPRK, where politics for the people is pursued, exploitation of men by men is abolished and houses are provided to the people free of charge and all people lead a happy life thanks to the benefits granted by the state such as the free healthcare system and free compulsory education system.
					
					 The DPRK is the only independent country in the world that stands against domination and subordination.
					
					 It is a moral obligation of the world progressives to support the DPRK's correct politics.
					
					 The DPRK is a utopia country progressive mankind aspires after.

articles.title: Representacion de EPC en Phanmunjom publica acta de revelacion
articles.content:
Representacion de EPC en Phanmunjom publica acta de revelacion
Pyongyang, 5 de julio (ACNC) -- La Representacion del Ejercito Popular de Corea en Phanmunjom hizo publica el dia 5 el acta de revelacion de la gravedad de la provocacion militar y las acciones conflictivas de los belicistas encaminadas a desatar la segunda guerra coreana. 
					Segun la nota, la zona desmilitarizada de la Linea de Demarcacion Militar (LDM) se ha convertido hoy en una gran mecha que se encendera en cualquier momento para desencadenar la guerra total.
					
					Se amplifican de manera escalonada las provocaciones militares como la "invasion al monte Song-ak" que sirvio de preludio de la provocacion de la pasada guerra coreana de la decada de 1950, y continuan sin parar los actos destinados a crear la confrontacion y el choque que se extenderian en un santiamen a una guerra total. 
					
					Son inimaginables las astutas maquinaciones del imperio yanqui y los titeres surcoreanos que convirtieron la zona desmilitarizada de la LDM en una base avanzada de agresion al Norte y en una escena de confrontacion fratricida. 
					
					Ya desde el tiempo anterior, los titeres surcoreanos enmendaron hasta los reglamentos de combate en la zona desmilitarizada favorablemente a la provocacion militar. 
					
					Todas las provocaciones abiertas que se perpetran freneticamente en toda la extension de la LDM se ejecutan bajo el control directo y la orden del Ministerio de Defensa Nacional titere y Chongwadae, he aqui la gravedad del caso. 
					
					No es la exageracion decir que la situacion creada actualmente en la zona desmilitarizada de la LDM se encuentra en un estado en visperas de la guerra de agresion al Norte. 
					
					Llaga al climax la propaganda demagogica que se desarrolla en todas las partes de la linea de demarcacion militar. 
					
					Prosigue durante mas de 16 horas al dia la radiodifusion  con los contenidos anti-socialismo y anti-RPDC. 
					
					Segun los datos publicados, quedaron lanzados en estos ultimos meses decenas de millones de volantes de contenidos difamantes a la maxima dignidad y el sistema de la RPDC y la vida del pueblo.
					
					Los belicistas titeres aprovechan la zona desmilitarizada de la LDM y su contorno como escenario de propaganda anti-RPDC que inculca el enfrentamiento fratricida al movilizar no solo la poblacion normal sino hasta los mocosos.   
					
					Tambien la nota revela la intencion astuta de los compinches titeres surcoreanos que agravan de modo escalonado la tension militar en la LDM. 
					
					Se puede decir que las peligrosas provocaciones militares y los actos conflictivos que se desarrollan en la zona desmilitarizada de la LDM se iniciaron desde cuando se puso fin a la pasada guerra coreana. 
					
					En vez de sacar la merecida leccion en la gran derrota sufrida en la guerra agresiva de 3 anos, los titeres surcoreanos se entregan mas que nunca a la aventurera provocacion militar considerando esa zona como base avanzada para la "invasion independiente al Norte". 
					
					Las provocaciones militares de los titeres surcoreanos amplificadas escalonadamente en la zona desmilitarizada causaban las rigurosas fases belicas muy tirantes. 
					
					Al margen de la politica hostil anti-RPDC extremadamente despotica del imperio yanqui, es imposible pensar en tal imprudencia de los belicistas de la capa militar titere que lleva toda la zona de la LDM en la crisis de confrontacion y conflicto. 
					
					Cuando fracaso su intencion de concertar favorablemente para si mismo los articulos del acuerdo de armisticio referentes a la zona desmilitarizada de la LDM, Estados Unidos comenzo a invalidar sistematicamente el acuerdo de armisticio acordado con la RPDC. 
					
					Con el vistoso casco de la Comision de Armisticio Militar de la "Comandancia de las Fuerzas de la ONU", Estados Unidos ampara insistentemente los freneticos alborotos de guerra de agresion al Norte que los belicistas titeres perpetran frecuentemente en los alrededores del frente sin distincion de tierra y mar, como "adiestramiento justo" segun el "proceso legal" que observa el acuerdo de armisticio, lo que es el incambiable metodo rutinario del imperio. 
					
					Para movilizar a los belicistas de la capa militar titere en la provocativa "operacion en la desembocadura del rio Han para expulsar los barcos pesqueros", escenifico en Phanmunjom una payasada de explicacion sobre su necesidad absoluta pronunciando con altavoz un "aviso" por el respecto y hasta tomo parte activo en ella.
					
					La LDM es el simbolo de rencor y tragedia a ser eliminada cuanto antes con el despiadado fusil del Songun. 
					
					Es invariable la voluntad del ejercito y el pueblo coreanos de eliminar cuanto antes esa LDM igual a la bomba de tiempo de agresion al Norte que no se sabe cuando se explotaria, lograr la paz duradera y la seguridad de la Peninsula Coreana y realizar la gran empresa de reunificacion.
					
					En este mundo terraqueo existen no pocos lugares donde hay el derramamiento de sangre y las rebeliones, los conflictos y  batallas. Pero no habra el lugar como la zona desmilitarizada de la LDM donde reina persistentemente el peligro de guerra nuclear muy tirante.
					
					Si son miembros de la nacion y tienen el alma de patriotismo, todos deben frustrar rotundamente las imprudentes maniobras de los belicistas que se desesperan para convertir la LDM en la mecha de provocacion de la segunda guerra coreana. 
					
					Sera castigada duramente sin falta la imprudente furia belica del imperio yanqui y los compinches titeres surcoreanos tendentes a desatar la segunda guerra coreana olvidandose de la leccion de gran derrota sufrida en la pasada guerra coreana.

articles.title: Continuan mitines de militares y civiles en provincias
articles.content:
Continuan mitines de militares y civiles en provincias
Pyongyang, 5 de julio (ACNC) -- Tuvieron lugar los mitines de militares y civiles de las provincias de Hwanghae del Norte, Hamgyong del Norte y Ryanggang, la ciudad de Nampho y otras ciudades y distritos para felicitar la eleccion de Kim Jong Un como Presidente del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					En las ocasiones participaron los funcionarios de los organismos locales del partido y el poder, entidades de masas, fabricas, empresas, granjas, universidades y otras unidades, los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea y el Ejercito de Seguridad Interior del Pueblo de Corea, trabajadores, jovenes y estudiantes.
					
					En los actos hubo informes y discursos.
					
					Los oradores dijeron que la eleccion de Kim Jong Un en el cargo supremo de la Republica en medio del absoluto apoyo y confianza de todo el ejercito y el pueblo es un gran jubilo  revolucionario que reviste importancia historica en llevar a feliz termino la causa revolucionaria del Juche iniciada en el monte Paektu.
					
					Subrayaron que los funcionarios, los militantes del Partido y los trabajadores deben conquistar a toda costa las metas de la Estrategia Quinquenal para el desarrollo de la economia nacional presentada por el Partido para contribuir mucho a hacer valer la gloriosa epoca de Kim Jong Un con la victoria orgullosa de la construccion de la potencia socialista.
					
					Destacaron que los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular observaran atentamente en estado de perfecta disposicion las maniobras agresivas de los imperialistas yanquis y las fuerzas satelites y garantizaran seguramente con el fusil de la revolucion la causa de la construccion de la potencia socialista.
					
					Apuntaron que los jovenes crearan incesantemente los mitos de heroes jovenes poniendo de pleno manifiesto el espiritu de autofortalecimiento y el de ataque de jovenes en los campos de construccion de la potencia socialista.

articles.title: Cae mucha lluvia en varias localidades de RPDC
articles.content:
Cae mucha lluvia en varias localidades de RPDC
Pyongyang, 5 de julio (ACNC) -- Se reportaron muchas precipitaciones en varias localidades de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					Debido al frente de lluvias y depresion atmosferica que se mantienen al sur de la zona central, cayeron muchas lluvias, incluso las torrenciales, en varias localidades en torno a las provincias de Hwanghae del Norte, de Hwanghae del Sur y de Kangwon entre las 12 del dia 4 y las 9 del dia 5.
					
					Especificamente, ellas son los distritos de Hoeyang (170mm), Phyonggang (139mm), Kosong (132mm), Changdo (158mm) y Kimhwa (154mm) de la provincia de Kangwon; Paechon (138mm) y Pongchon (137mm) de la provincia de Hwanghae del Sur; Jangphung (175mm) y Kumchon (135mm) de la provincia de Hwanghae del Norte; y la ciudad de Kaesong (140mm).
					
					El dia primero tambien llovio mucho en varias zonas, entre otras, los distritos de Ichon (142mm), Phyonggang (121mm) y Sepho (115mm) de la provincia de Kangwon y Singye (128mm) y Thosan (114mm) de la provincia de Hwanghae del Norte.
					
					La subdirectora del Centro Nacional de Pronosticos del Tiempo, Sim Myong Ok, dijo a la ACNC que se registraron muchas precipitaciones en las regiones septentrionales y centrales desde la segunda mitad de junio hasta principios de julio, y prosiguio:
					
					Este fenomeno natural se debe a la depresion atmosferica que pasa a menudo por aquellas regiones.
					
					Debido al frente de lluvias que se encuentra actualmente en la region sur, el aguacero caera de modo intermitente y durante varios dias en diferentes localidades y se preve que la estacion de muchas lluvias iniciara despues de la primera mitad de julio.

articles.title: Cientificos coreanos logran exitos contribuyentes a desarrollo economico
articles.content:
Cientificos coreanos logran exitos contribuyentes a desarrollo economico
Pyongyang, 5 de julio (ACNC) -- Los cientificos de la Academia Estatal de Ciencias levantados en la campana de 200 dias, logran uno tras otro los exitos contribuyentes al uso de los materiales domesticos y al desarrollo economico. 
					Inventaron la maquina de papel capaz de elaborar de una vez el papel funcional de diversos tipos y la bomba transportadora de pulpa y disenaron nuevamente la caja de almacenamiento de materias primas papeleras y el batidor. 
					
					Asi, abrieron una perspectiva para fabricar con las materias nacionales los papeles funcionales de nivel sofisticado de mas de 10 variedades. 
					
					Completaron la tecnica de obra del suelo de hormigon de color a estilo coreano y llevaron a cabo la nacionalizacion de las pinturas que antes dependian de la importacion. 
					
					Aplicaron una extraordinaria tecnica de obra que posibilita ahorrar muchas manos de obra y materiales y acortar notablemente el tiempo de la construccion. 
					
					Introdujeron los sistemas de informatizacion y control inventados por esos cientificos en las bases ganaderas de la zona de Sepho. 
					
					Los integrantes de la brigada de cientificos y tecnicos 17 de febrero elaboraron apenas en 15 dias y pico la maquina neumatica de gran eficiencia para separar el carbon de 100 toneladas y el separador de polvos de tela de filtrar en el complejo de construccion quimica y asi se eleva el rol de ellos.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun rechaza ambicion de usurpacion territorial de Japon
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun rechaza ambicion de usurpacion territorial de Japon
Pyongyang, 5 de julio (ACNC) -- Recientemente, se revelo el hecho de que los reaccionarios japoneses presentaron como problema de examen para alumnos de las escuelas primarias la teoria falsificada sobre la "jurisdiccion del islote Tok". 
					Esto parte de la artimana astuta de inculcar a los alumnos la idea de que la nacion coreana fue ocupante y el islote Tok es el territorio japones ocupado por los coreanos. 
					
					Revela el diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual de este martes y continua:
					
					La cinica tergiversacion de la historia de Japon resulta el preludio de guerra de los descendientes samurais que intentan infundir a los miembros de la nueva generacion la ambicion de expansion territorial y el sentimiento revanchista y lanzarlos a la nueva agresion a Corea. He aqui la peligrosidad de esta maniobra. 
					
					Lo grave del caso es que el intento de Japon de usurpar el islote Tok pasa el limite de la tergiversacion de la historia. 
					
					Los descendientes samurais ponen en practica los planes criminales para apoderarse con las fuerzas armadas del islote coreano Tok. 
					
					Hoy dia, bajo el amparo de EE.UU., disponen de las condiciones favorables a incorporarse a la guerra agresiva contra la RPDC y el resto del mundo liberandose de la deshonra del pais criminal de guerra. 
					
					El primer blanco de Japon es la RPDC. 
					
					Los reaccionarios japoneses difunden la teoria falsificada sobre la "jurisdiccion del islote Tok" a fin de preparar el pretexto de nueva agresion a Corea, pero es una ilusion vana. 
					
					Si el pais isleno sigue recurriendo a las maniobras de usurpacion territorial, el ejercito y pueblo coreanos lo sepultaran para siempre en el Mar Este de Corea.

articles.title: Minju Joson condena disparates conflictivos de Hong Yong Phyo
articles.content:
Minju Joson condena disparates conflictivos de Hong Yong Phyo
Pyongyang, 5 de julio (ACNC) -- Hace poco, el ministro de Unificacion del Sur de Corea, Hong Yong Phyo, en la asamblea plenaria del Comite de Relaciones Exteriores y Unificacion de la "Asamblea Nacional", disparateo que "si el Norte no opta el camino de desnuclearizacion, no hay el dialogo entre el Sur y el Norte", "el dialogo puede dar solo el tiempo y pretexto al Norte" y "hay que inducir al Norte por el cambio anteponiendo la sancion".
					Esto no pasa de ser el espasmo de los pobres psicopatas que se entregan solo a la confrontacion fratricida sin conocer la opinion publica y la tendencia, y los ultimos esfuerzos de los  maniacos conflictivos en peligro inminente de bancarrota.
					
					Asi senala el periodico Minju Joson en un comentario individual difundido este martes y prosigue:
					
					El Ministerio de Unificacion solo estuvo al frente de la confrontacion fratricida y del empeoramiento de las relaciones Norte-Sur sin contribuir nada a mejora de las relaciones intercoreanas y la reunificacion conforme a su deber.
					
					Hong Yong Phyo insiste todavia en la "desnuclearizacion del Norte", la "sancion" y el "cambio del Norte" observando la actitud de la gobernadora y adulandole, lo que demuestra que el mismo es el titere de Chongwadae y sirviente politico.
					
					Todos los hechos comprueban evidentemente que Hong y otra chusma del Ministerio de Unificacion del Sur de Corea persiguen solo la "unificacion mediante la fusion de regimenes" y la "unificacion mediante la absorbicion" y  pretenden enfrentarse hasta el fin contra la RPDC justificando el alboroto de "desnuclearizacion del Norte" y la campana de "sancion".
					
					Si ellos nadan contra la tendencia perdiendo el juicio, no evitara la severa sentencia de la historia y la nacion.

articles.title: EE.UU. ejercita ataque nuclear con "fuerzas de autodefensa" de Japon
articles.content:
EE.UU. ejercita ataque nuclear con "fuerzas de autodefensa" de Japon
Pyongyang, 5 de julio (ACNC) -- Segun la cadena surcoreana KBS, Estados Unidos realizo a mediados de junio el entrenamiento de ataque nuclear conjunto anti-RPDC incorporando a las "Fuerzas de Autodefensa" de Japon, pais criminal de guerra que acecha la oportunidad de agredir nuevamente a Corea. 
					Segun el plan de guerra nuclear anti-RPDC de la Casa Blanca, los 2 bombarderos estrategicos B-52, despegados de la base aerea norteamericana en Anderson de la isla Guam, desarrollaron el entrenamiento de despliegue y ataque nuclear a la zona estrategica en el supuesto tiempo de emergencia junto con los aviones de las "Fuerzas de Autodefensa" de Japon y la infanteria de marina norteamericana estacionada en el pais isla. 
					
					Los circulos militares de EE.UU. y el Sur de Corea anunciaron abiertamente que esa zona estrategica significa la Peninsula Coreana. 
					
					Como ya revelado, se prepara abiertamente ahora en el suelo norteamericano la "operacion de ataque aereo de precision" contra las instalaciones y las fuerzas armadas nucleares de la RPDC. 
					
					Los arriba mencionados ejercicios, que tuvieron lugar coincidiendo con la llegada de los medios de ataque nuclear de EE.UU., incluyendo portaaviones y submarinos nucleares, a la Peninsula Coreana y la zona maritima periferica, son una muestra contundente de que los belicistas norteamericanos amplian la dimension de las fuerzas de guerra nuclear renovando y complementando sin parar sus planes de guerra nuclear anti-RPDC.
